name: Regina Alapítvány Miskolc
goal:
The organization is run by women: we are a self-declared feminist organization, working on grassroots level in co-operation with local Roma women. The main aim of our organization is to develop and promote good practices and methods in the areas of communication and cooperation relating the issue of equal opportunities.

Strategic goals
- Empowering local Roma women in Northern-Hungary to act, together with non-Roma women, for their community regarding health-care issues;
- Building strategic partnership with the local school to provide the pupils, within the framework of classroom education, with lectures and seminars on sexual and reproductive rights;
- Changing the negative attitudes of local health care provides towards the Roma;
- Ending the mistreatment of Roma women during health/maternity care services;
- Direct involvement of Roma women into negotiation with health care providers;
- Developing transferable and sustainable models for common actions of Roma and non-Roma women in the field of health-care;
- Promoting the model of ’Acting together’ between Roma women and health care providers in other settlements in the region of Northern Hungary
